subject: Assess
content: We assess your current level, ability and skill with years of insight and experience.

subject: Plan
content: We map out relevant topics, subjects and assessments that will need to be covered to meet the desired grade.

subject: Achieve
content: We set challenging, attainable goals and foster self-competition.

subject: Iterate
content: We communicate the performance with the parents and repeat the process. With brief weekly reports on results.
